attributes.action: look at making certain benefits be erned through  community service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The amount of benefit which people receive could be 'earned'back  through hours doing worthwhile and necessary jobs in the comunity which are under funded and under resourced.
Of course not all everyone could do this- I was thinking more about the young people on an estate near me who spend most of their time hanging around, living on benefits and don't seem to care about their local community. They may gain out of community work and get experience and give them a new lease of enthusiasm which may lead them to pursue employment and further training.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
